source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Drawing Lesson For Beginners
items.headline: The Simplest Way to Create a Great Drawing. The Method is Revealed in This Step By Step Charcoal Drawing Course.
objectives_summary: How to draw anything you want by using simple geometric lines and angles
How to find and mass in the most important shadow shapes
How to accurately place highlights in your drawing

items.title: The Event Caricature Drawing Course - Beginer to Advanced
items.headline: Learn how to draw caricatures that people like. In just 3 minutes or less!
objectives_summary: How to draw Caricatures fast
How to draw caricatures that people like
How to color b&w caricatures

items.title: Cold Process Soap Making for Beginners- Start your Business.
items.headline: Learn How to Make Natural Soap at Home and Make your Own Business..
objectives_summary: Go through detailed instructions about every single part of cold process soap making.
Learn how to calculate and adjust your own cold process soap recipes.
Calculate how much soap needed to make to fil your mold.

items.title: Art for Beginners : Daily Cartoon Drawing lessons
items.headline: 40 Drawing Lessons for Beginners to Learn Every Day for a Month. Build Focus, Confidence & Creative Thinking Skills.
objectives_summary: In 40 drawing and coloring lessons, learn to create fun cartoon drawings and scenes!
Participate in creative activities, which are great for improving and developing motor skills, confidence, focus and expression.
Learn how to create your own drawings by following a step-by-step process during our exercises.

items.title: Making Beautiful Articulated Hinged Jewelry
items.headline: A fun fast-tracked course to get you making amazing hinged jewelry like a professional
objectives_summary: They will be able to utilize mechanisms to produce unique jewelry wearables.

items.title: Painting: be proud of your first watercolour painting
items.headline: Want to experience the thrill of seeing the birth of a landscape while you're enjoying using watercolors? It's easy!
objectives_summary: Have fun while you learn
Produce your own painting
Get the skills to be able to paint something similar aftewords

items.title: Learn Shading in Procreate - Quick Guide for Beginners
items.headline: Learn the Basics of Shading and Level Up Your Drawing Skills in Your Digital Illustration on Your iPad in Procreate
objectives_summary: to distinguish between the types of shadows
to create a value range with a seamless gradient
how light direction affects shadows

items.headline: Explore And Explore Expressive Acrylic, Mixed Media & Collage Skills!
objectives_summary: Learn a variety of methods for exploring expressive techniques.
Paint loose, fun and colorful cow artwork.

items.headline: Find Your Own Unique Floral Style
objectives_summary: Floral illustration
How to develop you Floral style

items.title: Realistic Animals with Pastels
items.headline: Easy techniques you can use for all types of animals!
objectives_summary: Create a realistic animal portrait in under 5 hours, using soft pastels and pencils

items.title: Learn to Paint This Textured Abstract Art Painting
items.headline: Create Abstract Art - Guided Class
objectives_summary: How to paint a textured acrylic painting step-by-step

items.title: Sewing Intro for Absolute Beginners
items.headline: This course is specifically designed to teach absolute beginners how to sew.
objectives_summary: Learn how to use a sewing machine
Learn parts and functions of a sewing machine
Learn sewing tips and tricks

items.title: QUICK START painting with watercolors, play & learn PART 1

visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur

items.headline: Painting in watercolor? Easy when you do this course? Relax and play and gain the confidence to paint by having fun.
objectives_summary: Learn how your paints work by painting with them.
Beginners will improve their colour blending skills.
Get to grips with your brushes, how to use them effectively.

items.title: How to Draw Animal Portraits for Beginners
items.headline: Learn How to Sketch Beautiful Animal and Pet Portraits with Step-by-Step Instructions
objectives_summary: How to make all your shading smoothly blend together (This will help you draw more soft and realistic looking fur)
How to use “negative shading” to create beautiful white fur
How to add texture to your animal portrait to make it look more realistic

items.headline: Learn the art of painting loose through design and composition.
objectives_summary: How to avoid common mistakes with design and composition.
How to paint loose, expressive still life art.
Painting in layers to create more dynamic qualities.
